name: Get Your Trash Off My Lawn
name_original: Get Your Trash Off My Lawn
description:
Your neighbor is throwing trash on your lawn!

Keep it off for as long as possible with the help of your trusty trampoline and a few handy powerups.

Controls: A/D or Left/Right arrows to move trampoline

This game was created by Roosevelt Sinker for Ludum Dare 50: Delay the Inevitable
